name: epildev-contact-page
description: Quantum-inspired futuristic contact page for EpilDev

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:frontend2" "npm run dev:backend"
scripts.dev:frontend: cd frontend && VITE_LOCALHOST_FE=100 npm run dev
scripts.dev:frontend2: cd frontend && VITE_LOCALHOST_FE=300 npm run dev
scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && LOCALHOST_BE=200 LOCALHOST_FE=100 npm run dev
